      • permissionToUpdateIngredients

        public boolean permissionToUpdateIngredients(int id,
                                             int quant)
        Check if the storage have enough raw materials to make a product in quantity we want
        Parameters:
        id - -the product's id we want to made
        quant - -the quantity of product we want to make(with +)
        Returns:
        if the storage have enough raw materials to make a product in quantity we want, return true, else false

      • permissionToDecreaseRawMaterials

        public boolean permissionToDecreaseRawMaterials(int corderid)
        Creates a HashMap with total quantities of raw materials of a COrder and checks if raw materials can be decreased by this quantity
        Parameters:
        corderid - COrder's id
        Returns:
        false - if at least one RawMaterial is insufficient, true - if all quantities are sufficient

      • updateQuantityOfRawMaterialBy

        public Function<Integer,Integer> updateQuantityOfRawMaterialBy(int q)
        Create a function and when you apply a rawmaterials' quantity in the function it returns how much the quantity of the rawmaterial must change in storage.
        Parameters:
        q-the - quantity of product we want to make(with +) or destroy(with -)
        Returns:
        q returns an integer function
